## Properties

| Property   | Attribute   | Description                                                                                                                                        | Type                              | Default   |
| ---------- | ----------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------- | --------- |
| `safeZone` | `safe-zone` | Defines the outer spacings between the content area and the left and right screen sides, as well as centering its content and setting a max-width. | `"basic" \| "enhanced" \| "none"` | `'basic'` |
